purpose: The analyses can help inform QNDOR on how to successfully enforce tax compliance related to digital currency and peer-to-peer cash apps.
question: What issues will the expanded use of digital currency and peer-to-peer cash apps create in terms of QNDOR’s ability to enforce tax compliance?
deliverable:
- Quantitative and qualitative analyses of the impact of digital currency and peer-to-peer cash apps on revenue departments in other states and at the federal level.
- Recommendations for successfully enforcing tax compliance related to digital currency and peer-to-peer cash apps.
summary: The Quinetucket Department of Revenue (QNDOR) administers tax laws and collects taxes due in an impartial, consistent, and secure manner. It is the goal of QNDOR that all taxpayers voluntarily comply with their tax obligations. This means filing and paying all returns due and taxes owed in a timely manner. With the increasing use of cryptocurrency exchanges, QNDOR is seeking an analysis of the impact of cryptocurrency transactions on QN tax obligations.
title: Digital Tax Compliance
